message: Getting random "ValueError: Invalid parameter string" being triggered by line 285 from the oauth2 library's `__init__.py` file. Any ideas?
@kennethlove, I've got this one and fixed it a few days ago, so using git version should work, also I've just tagged v0.5.7 and uploaded it to pypi.
Thanks. Dev partner tested 0.5.7 and confirmed it fixed the issue for us.
